title: Friday Pt2: Rams react to loss,  Kyle and Peter stroll thru NYC, a Nate Burleson surprise, and Pickle Picks!
itunes:title: Friday Pt2: Rams react to loss,  Kyle and Peter stroll thru NYC, a Nate Burleson surprise, and Pickle Picks!
description:
Part Two of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Rams reaction to an Opening Night home loss to the Bills.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty express concern for LA while keeping in mind it's only Week 1.  Kyle and Peter take a stroll through NYC while discussing what they'll be watching for this weekend.  After highlighting some of the best Week 1 games, Nate Burleson drops by with a surprise Super Bowl Pick.  We wrap up the week with Pickle Picks!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
